definition: erhua variant of 這邊|这边[zhe4 bian1]
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Customer: Actually, I"m more interested in these here."
sentences.chinese: 其實，我更想看看這邊兒這些。

sentences.english: This way please, this is your table.
sentences.chinese: 這邊兒請，這是你們的桌子。
